detail_desc: Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a visible press-stud at the waist, fake fly and sewn-in creases.
Wide top in a patterned cotton weave with wide shoulder tie straps and elastication with a frill trim at the top.

Wide shirt in patterned satin with notch lapels, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Contrasting colour trims.
V-neck top in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Unlined.

Blouse in cotton poplin with a collar, concealed buttons at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide, flared flounce and button at the cuffs. Yoke with pleats at the back and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Mesh bustier with embroidered appliqués and underwired cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, softer front panels for additional support, a zip in the side and an elasticated hem. Mesh-lined front.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with short, scallop-edged puff sleeves and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.

Plastic swimming goggles with decorative rubber appliqués on the front and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
Knee-length satin wrap dress with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the front. Adjustable spaghetti straps and a seam at the waist with a flared, asymmetric skirt. Lined at the top.

Cap in cotton twill with embroidered motifs. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the top and raglan sleeves with sewn-on ties at the cuffs. Loose yoke at the back, welt side pockets, a soft detachable waist belt with metal D rings and a single back vent. Lined.

Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the top and raglan sleeves with sewn-on ties at the cuffs. Loose yoke at the back, welt side pockets, a soft detachable waist belt with metal D rings and a single back vent. Lined.
Short off-the-shoulder dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Elasticated with a double flounce at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.

V-neck sports bra in fast-drying, functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide elastic straps that cross at the back, a wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is made partly from recycled polyester and polyamide.
